guest network airplay idea: wire the macbook into guest and put AirServer on it
You would still need to be on “guest” to Airplay to the Macbook no?
yes, but you could at least give people access
Yeah. I was thinking you put all the Apple TV’s on Guest. That way visitors could easily connect or for employees who have previously connected to guest, it would be a quick switch to enable airplay?
